comments: This is a test to train the TMVA4D model: Temporal Multi-View network with ASPP modules for 4D radar data. Methods: data aug (flip) + multi loss + 5 input frames. Model selection: mean of precision. Normalisation: TVT. Loss: wCE + weighted Soft Dice Loss (10*SDice) + weighted (Unsupervised) Coherence Loss (5*CoL).
